function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Socioeconomic attributes influencing frequency of visiting green areas","Impact":"Reduced access to green areas for certain socioeconomic groups","Mitigation":"Promote policies that address socioeconomic disparities in access to green areas","Technologies":"Targeted outreach campaigns, community engagement initiatives","People":"Residents with lower household income, fewer children, and specific genders and ages","Owner":"Local government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Environmental contexts having a weaker influence on visiting green areas than socioeconomic attributes","Impact":"Potential neglect of environmental factors in promoting access to green areas","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive assessments of both socioeconomic and environmental factors to inform policy decisions","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, GIS mapping, environmental impact assessments","People":"Urban planners, environmental researchers, policy makers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Income level becoming a factor that influences the use of green areas","Impact":"Exclusion of lower-income individuals from green areas due to financial barriers","Mitigation":"Create programs for subsidized access to green areas, prioritize green space development in low-income neighborhoods","Technologies":"Community outreach programs, crowdfunding platforms, urban green space planning tools","People":"Low-income residents, community advocates","Owner":"Local government, nonprofit organizations"}]}
